subject: Re: Steve's Box #11----Youtube video
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Youtube screwed that video up, here is the new link:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uue2ThLQRVo

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, urkel23@... wrote:
>
> This is the homemade box with all the basic stuff on it. I put switches for 
>  the
> band and power, also has an adjustable sweep rate. It's AM/FM and sounds  
> pretty
> decent on both, i'm using an amplified radio shack speaker to avoid  
> building an
> AMP section. There really isn't much more room in that case for  much else
> anyway.
> 
> Here's the youtube video:
> 
> _http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mlx9zr4SKjQ_ 
> (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mlx9zr4SKjQ) 
> 
> -Steve  H.
